title: Create And Amend Dividends Income Request
description: Create And Amend Dividends Income Request

ukDividends.description: The total dividends payments received from UK companies, including any dividends from employee share schemes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherUkDividends.description:
Dividends received from these types of UK investment fund:

Authorised unit trusts, Open-ended investment companies or Investment trusts. Include dividends from accumulation units or shares, which are automatically reinvested. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
